name: StAugustineRecord
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Today's top headlines from the St. Augustine Record.

After enabling this skill, say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing" or "Alexa, what's in the news" to hear your flash briefing.

Links to the full stories from the briefing will be available on your Alexa app home screen.

You can move St. Augustine Record to the top of your flash briefing list in the settings on your Alexa app.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
